Description: Guidance for installation and initial product setup.

Submodules.Installation & Setup: Provides instructions for downloading WordPress, setting up hosting, configuring databases, and completing the initial installation.

Submodules.Plugin Usage: Explains how to install, activate, update, and manage plugins to extend WordPress features.

Description: Security, privacy, and access control features.

Submodules.Security Settings: Describes security best practices and the process for responsibly reporting security vulnerabilities.

Description: Features related to managing user accounts and settings.

Submodules.Account Settings: Covers user roles, profile updates, and account-related preferences in WordPress.
